dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [everydns #AIW-44418-730]: help: abuse!]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 01, 2005 1:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@everydns.net
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [everydns #AIW-44418-730]: help: abuse!]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] [everydns #AIW-44418-730]: help: abuse!
Date: Thu, 01 Dec 2005 19:35:54 +0000
From: Everybox Abuse <abuse@everydns.net>
Reply-To: Everybox Abuse <abuse@everydns.net>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
References: <iqu3q6.mudbb2@support.everybox.com>

[[ This is a forwarded message ]]

On Thu Dec  1 2005 09:16AM doctorcinque@hotmail.com wrote:



Hi, You are hosting a guy who is engaged in criminal activity. The site
is: http://hghspray.pillslist.info. He has stolen all of the written
material from my website at www.hgh2live.com and until today, he even was
using my picture and that of my grandson under the bogus name Dr.
Andrew Johnson with grandson George. If you go to his site now, you will see
a goofy graph where the picture used to be. He is obviously running scared.
But he is still using all of my written materials. If you click on his
Report (which is my report) and scroll down to the bottom of it, you will
see that the phone number listed for "Dr. Johnson" is 512 295 4256. That is
my phone number! He foolishly left it in there. Please shut him down right
away. He is committing a crime, and I have already filed a complaint with
the FBI. Please help me with this. I can be reached at this email adress or
at the number given above. Thank you. Dr. Ralph Cinque


 With MSN Spaces email straight to your blog. Upload jokes, photos and more.
It's free!



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
